The only real problem I see with Lux is that her weakness is supposed to be "getting to her" to kill hear easily, however she has a big-ass shield that keeps her safe even from assassins in the late game. 
Secondly, her "poke" is not dodgeable. If she knows what she's doing, you cannot dodge her E poke at all. 

She either needs a nerf to her long-range poke and 100-0 combo, or to her close combat. It's so frustrating when you actually dodge her Q, jump to her and suddenly she has an 700HP shield - and then she 100-0s you with E, R and passive.
Even Xerath's long - range combo is weaker than hers. :/

This. Its not hard to land a E poke while playing her. Its half the lane so most of the time it will hit and u cant even get to her.

The problem is not its range, it's that you have literally zero time to get out of it. Yes, you can bait it so hard that she misses it completely, however in most cases it is impossible to dodge. 

It's not the AoE that's the problem, it's that it's treated like a skillshot (so it has nice range and good base damage) when it's not. Annie's Q is very strong poke but even that is less annoying, because it doesn't chunk you for 250 damage at lvl 9 from 1500 range.

And not even this alone is the problem. Cassiopeia, Xerath and Syndra are just as bad. 
However, none of them have a big-ass shield that prevents them from dying even if you manage to get at them. Orianna has the same problem, however at least she can't 100-0 you so easily because her kit has less damage.

I seriously don't see why Lux has to have a powerful defensive spell when she's so good at sieging. She already has her Q to keep people away, just like Syndra has her E and Xerath has his E. They don't get a bonus shield to make sure they can survive assassins.
Not to mention a point blank xerath e is like a Luna or Gundarr q from Dota. Literally a mini stun that only serves to stop a channel or something

If memory serves, Luna's beam actually stuns for 0,8 seconds which is longer than Xerath's 0,5s stun at point blank after the nerfs (it used to be 0,75 iirc).

Gondar's shuriken now stuns twice with Aghanim's tho :D
